mapper.select:
SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.SEEDFILEID AS seedfileid, T.MANUREDATE AS manuredate, T.MUCK AS muck, T.MUCKFACTORY AS muckfactory, T.CONTENT AS content, T.DOSAGE AS dosage, T.USETYPE AS usetype, T.BYPERSON AS byperson, T.PRINCIPAL AS principal, T.CREATEDATE AS createdate, T.OPERATORID AS operatorid, T.DOSAGEUNIT AS dosageunit, T.USEWATER AS usewater, T.SQUARESEEMS AS squareseems, T.SQUAREUNIT AS squareunit FROM fertilization T
ORDER BY T.CREATEDATE desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fertilization ( GUID, SEEDFILEID, MANUREDATE, MUCK, MUCKFACTORY, CONTENT, DOSAGE, USETYPE, BYPERSON, PRINCIPAL, CREATEDATE, OPERATORID, DOSAGEUNIT, USEWATER, SQUARESEEMS, SQUAREUNIT ) VALUES ( #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seedfileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manuredate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{muck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{muckfactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{usetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosageunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usewater,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{squareseems,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{squareunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM fertilization WHERE GUID IN
#{id}
